narration: Welcome to a journey into the future of space exploration with ISRO.  This presentation outlines the ambitious goals of ISRO Mission 2047.

title: Key Objectives
content:
Human Spaceflight to Mars
Establishing a Lunar Base
Advancement in Space Technology
International Collaboration
image_desc:
An artist's rendering of a crewed spacecraft landing on Mars, with the Martian landscape in the background. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: ISRO Mission 2047 sets its sights on some truly remarkable objectives.  We are aiming for human spaceflight to Mars establishing a permanent lunar base significant advancements in space technology and fostering strong international collaborations.

title: Technological Advancements
content:
**Column 1: Propulsion Systems**
Development of advanced propulsion systems for faster and more efficient space travel.
Research into reusable launch vehicles to reduce costs.
**Column 2: Life Support Systems**
Creation of advanced life support systems for long-duration space missions.
Development of closed-loop ecological systems for sustainable habitats.
image_desc:
A split image showing a futuristic rocket engine on one side and a diagram of a closed-loop life support system on the other. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: To achieve these goals significant technological leaps are necessary.  We are focusing on developing advanced propulsion systems including reusable launch vehicles and creating innovative life support systems for longduration space missions including selfsustaining ecological habitats.

title: International Partnerships
content:
Collaborative research and development with international space agencies.
Sharing of resources and expertise to accelerate progress.
Joint missions to explore the solar system.
image_desc:

narration: ISRO Mission 2047 recognizes the importance of international collaboration.  We plan to work closely with other space agencies sharing resources and expertise to achieve our common goals of space exploration and scientific discovery.
